document.full_text: the u.n. security council condemned an attack on the u.n. compound in the northern afghan city of mazar-i-sharif on friday that left at least 12 people dead, including seven u.n. staff.
document.title: u.n. council condemns attack on u.n. in afghanistan
lines_and_colors: the u.n. security council condemned an attack on the u.n. compound in the northern afghan city of mazar-i-sharif on friday that left at least 12 people dead, including seven u.n. staff.
